controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles all user interaction, such as clicks, drags, keyboard presses, and calls the appropriate methods in the model.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Controller.BrushDraw
      Handles brush drawing
      class  Controller.ButtonController
      Handles all the buttons' ActionEvents.
      class  Controller.Click
      Handles shape selection process
      class  Controller.Drag
      Handles the dragging event for both shape and brush mouse drags.
      class  Controller.DragStarter
      Initial handler for shape drawing process.
      class  Controller.MenuController
      Handles all the menu items' ActionEvents.
      class  Controller.ShortcutController
      Handles all possible keyboard shortcuts
      class  Controller.StateController<T extends javafx.event.Event>
      Handles all events related to state management
